note:
Much to learn, much to say.
Late bloomer - still blooming 🌸

Tech worker & hobbyist 💻

Community organizer in support of labor and tenant unions (among other efforts). 🤝

Autonomous sites of democratic power over our labor is how I believe we can overcome Capitalism. We can, and must, build a better world together. 🫂

Free Palestine. End the genocide. 🇵🇸
